form.label: NMON - MEM, Linux Memory and Swap Usage

search.query: | tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($osfilter$) groupby "MEM.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "MEM.frameID" | sort limit=0 "MEM.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "MEM.frameID"

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) (MEM.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) groupby "MEM.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "MEM.hostname"

| tstats max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1s | bucket _time span=1s | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | rename "MEM.hostname" AS hostname "MEM.frameID" AS "frameID" | stats dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("memused_MB") AS memused_MB $statsmode$("memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT $statsmode$("memfree_MB") AS memfree_MB $statsmode$("memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT $statsmode$("memtotal_MB") AS memtotal_MB $statsmode$("buffers_MB") AS buffers_MB $statsmode$("buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT $statsmode$("cached_MB") AS cached_MB $statsmode$("cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT $statsmode$("active_MB") AS active_MB $statsmode$("active_PCT") AS active_PCT $statsmode$("inactive_MB") AS inactive_MB $statsmode$("inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT $statsmode$("swapused_MB") AS swapused_MB $statsmode$("swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT $statsmode$("swapfree_MB") AS swapfree_MB $statsmode$("swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT $statsmode$("swaptotal_MB") AS swaptotal_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_MB") AS swapcached_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by _time, frameID, hostname | sort limit=0 frameID,hostname | fields frameID, hostname, memused_MB, memused_PCT, memfree_MB, memfree_PCT, memtotal_MB, buffers_MB, buffers_PCT, cached_MB, cached_PCT, active_MB, active_PCT, inactive_MB, inactive_PCT, swapused_MB, swapused_PCT, swapfree_MB, swapfree_PCT, swaptotal_MB, swapcached_MB, swapcached_PCT | foreach *_MB [eval <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>, 0)] | foreach *_PCT [eval <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>, 2)]

eval memfree_MB=round(memfree_MB,0) | eval memused_MB=round(memused_MB,0) | eval memtotal_MB=round(memtotal_MB,0) | eval buffers_MB=round(buffers_MB,0) | eval cached_MB=round(cached_MB,0) | eval active_MB=round(active_MB,0) | eval inactive_MB=round(inactive_MB,0) | $memmode$ | fields - _time | rename memfree_MB As "memfree (MB)", memused_MB As "memused (MB)", memtotal_MB As "memtotal (MB)", buffers_MB As "buffers (MB)", cached_MB As "cached (MB)", active_MB As "active (MB)", inactive_MB As "inactive (MB)" | rename memfree_PCT As "memfree (%)", memused_PCT As "memused (%)", buffers_PCT As "buffers (%)" , cached_PCT As "cached (%)", active_PCT As "active (%)", inactive_PCT As "inactive (%)" | fields frameID,hostname,$memfilter$

eval swapfree_MB=round(swapfree_MB,0) | eval swapused_MB=round(swapused_MB,0) | eval swaptotal_MB=round(swaptotal_MB,0) | eval swapcached_MB=round(swapcached_MB,0) | $memmode$ | fields - _time | rename swaptotal_MB As "swaptotal (MB)", swapused_MB As "swapused (MB)", swapfree_MB As "swapfree (MB)", swapcached_MB As "swapcached (MB)" | rename swapused_PCT As "swapused (%)", swapfree_PCT As "swapfree (%)", swapcached_PCT As "swapcached (%)", | fields frameID,hostname,$swapfilter$

| tstats max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1s | bucket _time span=1s | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.memused") AS memused_MB max("MEM.memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT max("MEM.memfree") AS memfree_MB max("MEM.memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT max("MEM.memtotal") AS memtotal_MB max("MEM.buffers") AS buffers_MB max("MEM.buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT max("MEM.cached") AS cached_MB max("MEM.cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT max("MEM.active") AS active_MB max("MEM.active_PCT") AS active_PCT max("MEM.inactive") AS inactive_MB max("MEM.inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | sort limit=0 "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | $charting$ | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,earliest=$timerange.earliest$,latest=$timerange.latest$)` useother=f limit=0 dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("memused_MB") AS memused_MB $statsmode$("memused_PCT") AS memused_PCT $statsmode$("memfree_MB") AS memfree_MB $statsmode$("memfree_PCT") AS memfree_PCT $statsmode$("memtotal_MB") AS memtotal_MB $statsmode$("buffers_MB") AS buffers_MB $statsmode$("buffers_PCT") AS buffers_PCT $statsmode$("cached_MB") AS cached_MB $statsmode$("cached_PCT") AS cached_PCT $statsmode$("active_MB") AS active_MB $statsmode$("active_PCT") AS active_PCT $statsmode$("inactive_MB") AS inactive_MB $statsmode$("inactive_PCT") AS inactive_PCT by "MEM.hostname" | $memmode$ | fields _time, $memfilter$

| tstats max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT from datamodel=NMON_Data_MEM where (nodename = MEM) ($hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) `$timefilter$(MEM)` groupby _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" prestats=true span=1s | bucket _time span=1s | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("MEM.swapused") AS swapused_MB max("MEM.swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT max("MEM.swapfree") AS swapfree_MB max("MEM.swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT max("MEM.swaptotal") AS swaptotal_MB max("MEM.swapcached") AS swapcached_MB max("MEM.swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by _time, "MEM.frameID", "MEM.hostname" | fields - _span | timechart `inline_customspan(type=MEM,earliest=$timerange.earliest$,latest=$timerange.latest$)` useother=f limit=0 dedup_splitvals=t $statsmode$("swapused_MB") AS swapused_MB $statsmode$("swapused_PCT") AS swapused_PCT $statsmode$("swapfree_MB") AS swapfree_MB $statsmode$("swapfree_PCT") AS swapfree_PCT $statsmode$("swaptotal_MB") AS swaptotal_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_MB") AS swapcached_MB $statsmode$("swapcached_PCT") AS swapcached_PCT by "MEM.hostname" | $memmode$ | fields _time, $swapfilter$ | $charting$
